desc: Beautiful warm ski gloves and ski mittens for real skiers and snowboarders. Warm, durable and affordable ski gloves and ski mittens designed by a former ski racer and ski racing coach.

layout.text: In my 50+ years of skiing and 30 years as a Ski Coach in Vermont I have skied with every brand of ski glove and mitten in all kinds of weather. Most of them are overpriced, not warm and don't last very long. Our goal is to design and manufacture the warmest, most durable and affordable ski gloves and mittens made from the Finest Soft Full Grain leather available.
